text: tum logon ke lie ibaraaheem mein aur un logon mein jo usake saath the achchha aadarsh hai, jabaki unhonne apanee qaum ke logon se kah diya ki "ham tumase aur allaah se hatakar jinhen tum poojate ho unase virakt hai. hamane tumhaara inakaar kiya aur hamaare aur tumhaare beech sadaiv ke lie vair aur vidvesh prakat ho chuka jab tak akele allaah par tum eemaan na lao." ioobaraaheem ka apane baap se yah kahana apavaad hai ki "main aapake lie kshama kee praarthana avashy karoonga, yadyapi allaah ke muqaabale mein aapake lie main kisee cheez par adhikaar nahin rakhata." "ai hamaare rab! hamane tujhee par bharosa kiya aur teree hee or rujoo hue aur teree hee or ant mein lautana hain.
